text: Ancistrolepis is a genus of sea snails, marine gastropod mollusks in the family Buccinidae, the true whelks. ==Species== Species within the genus Ancistrolepis include: * Ancistrolepis grammatus (Dall, 1907) * and others Synonyms: * Ancistrolepis magna (Dall, 1895) is a synonym of Clinopegma magnum (Dall, 1895) ==References== ==External links== Category:Buccinidae Category:Gastropod genera
title: Ancistrolepis
